DESCRIPTION: Revolutions per minute (RPM): Number of revolutions the cutter has in one minute.

FORMULA: IPM = RPM x number of flutes x chip load
DESCRIPTION: Inches per minute (IPM): Number of inches the cutter passes through the workpiece

FORMULA: Chip load = IPM / RPM x number of flutes
DESCRIPTION: Chip load: Amount each flute cuts during a single revolution of the cutting tool.

FORMULA: SFM = .262 x tool diameter x RPM
DESCRIPTION: Surface feet per minute (SFM): Number of feet a given point on the circumference of the cutter travels per minute.
